website_summaries.verdict: Decent TV with a versatile 65-inch screen and smart technology for a mid-level price point. Works well in mid-size to large rooms.
pros: Features 4K images, 65-inch screen, and Al ThinQ smart technology for a price that's significantly less than OLED options
Not overly difficult to set up and begin streaming, watching TV, or gaming
cons: Sound quality isn't as good as expected
Stand feels flimsy, almost as if the TV could tip over

customer_reviews.title: Cheap tv
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 65 inch. It came with a broken screen. Got it replaced and had the same issue. These are very cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great HDR!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is superb! I'm really loving the HDR! The TV was package very well as usual. Thanks Amazon! Pros: - HDR is beautiful. The blacks are actually black. - Easy to understand instructions and an easy quick setup. - Excellent clear & lifelike viewing. Overall great entry level 4K UHD HDR TV Cons: - Sound quality - TV legs could be better quality but overall sturdy - Sling app hangs and can freezes the TV from time to time. Could be a faulty app.
customer_reviews.author: Jac Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it. I feel like I should have spent ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this setup this week. Absolutely love it. I feel like I should have spent a lot more money for this TV than I did. I'm seriously considering buying a second one for the other room.
customer_reviews.author: David Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Stuck Pixels Less Than a Week In
customer_reviews.text: I loved this TV for the first week. It has quite great quality for as cheap as it is. Unfortunately, however, I noticed two stuck pixels after a week or so. Two isn't enough for a return according to LG's policy so I'm just stuck with two green pixels for good, as none of the fixes I've tried have had any result. Update: I actually did bother to return the first one TV I got through Amazon and purchase a second one. Unfortunately the second one now has a damaged HDMI port less than a week in. It simply will not detect any cord I try to use with it. I am furious.
customer_reviews.author: kahlelly

customer_reviews.title: Alexa Deficient
customer_reviews.text: Alexa does not work! Follow all the instructions and registration and all you get is the ability to turn off the TV. Worthless. Definitely not a smart tv. I don’t understand why Amazon calls this lWorks with Alexa.” Did anyone actually test it? Very disappointed with both companies.
customer_reviews.author: Tc

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV. Of course coming from an 15 year old dynex 55” any new tv is leaps and bounds above it. Great picture, works great with the PS4 pro and the 4K is very good. My dad has a Samsung 65 4K and this compares nicely. My fiancé loves that it works with Alexa. Easy to set up and use. Great upgrade for football season!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Murph

customer_reviews.title: Great TV! Excellent picture quality!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this TV. I got it for a Christmas present. I immediately read the bad reviews. Some came broken which honestly I’d give it a one star to if that were the case but my TV was 100% intact. Screen quality is amazing. Colors are vibrant and I can see pores on people’s faces. I mean can’t get much clearer than that! HDMI works for us. However, I have yet to try it with Alexa so I can’t speak to those bad reviews. I didn’t rate the durability because I haven’t had it for long. So we’ll see how “durable” it is with time. But overall I’m very pleased with this TV and would definitely recommend buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Dead tv
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if I just got a bad tv but it worked for about 5 hours and then shut down. Screen glitch then the dreaded red blinking light was all I got after that.
customer_reviews.author: James buffington

customer_reviews.title: Unit failed out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Unit will not power up. LG support determined the unit is defective. Third attempt to get a replacement failed. Will try again later. Fourth attempt to set up a return failed with this message: An error has occurred, but rest assured, we’re working to resolve it as quickly as possible. If you’re trying to check a return's status or print existing return labels, please visit Your Orders. To request a new return, please check back soon. We apologize for the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: looks great, brings older movies to life
customer_reviews.text: looks great, brings older movies to life, 4K is amazing. They have an app, and claim it works with alexa, couldn't get either to work, but the TV is great.
customer_reviews.author: Stew

customer_reviews.title: Not Fully Alexa Compatible
customer_reviews.text: So purchased this in July 2018, connected to Amazon Echo in December 2018. Had real had time connecting. Had to reset TV and Alexa mutiple times (this was with Alexa Tech Support & LG Tech support in a 3 way phone communications). Their professional opinion it’s not as easy as advertised. TV wasn’t defective just very difficult to connect to Alexa Devices. The big thing u still can’t use Alexa to TURN IT ON, The TV will not turn on without help of remote. So gotta have TV remote out all the time. Kinda defeated the purpose of getting TV. LG’s response is o well it does everything else. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED!
customer_reviews.text: Top of the screen was cracked! What a hassle to have to repack and tray to ship it back. I should have known having a tv packed in the same delivery truck along with other loose heavy items wouldn't be a good idea. Best buy next time!
customer_reviews.author: Firefighter

customer_reviews.title: HDMI port failures
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July and December one of the hdmi ports stopped working. This TV only comes with 3 so that’s a big deal with limited options for a home theatre system. I’ve had a Sharp Aquos since 2009 and all hdmi ports are still functional.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PIC & AUDIO!
customer_reviews.text: bought this one because it has a great picture & fabulous audio. Settings can be confusing, but all new Tv's are like that. YES, I bought buy it again & again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got stuck with a broken tv and no one will help
customer_reviews.text: I received product broken nothing worked as described and amazon and seller didn’t do anything about it. I’m out $800. And no Tv!!!! No one stood behind the product or there prime customer! I’m done with amazon now Be careful
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Van Winkle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A very nice TV. SMart works well with Alexa. The setup was less than 5 minutes. I located and set the TV on the stand alone, no help and was not really a problem. Picture is really good and has adjustments to fit your preferences. Sound is good but I added a sound bar purchased from Amazon to enhance the sound spectrum and the range..... Mine is on its feet, not on a wall and is very stable.......
customer_reviews.author: Larry Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Love my TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV is amazing ! We absolutely love it. To have a television of this size delivered to my house was perfect. The amazon delivery people even brought it into our living room for us ! This saved us A LOT of hassle as a television of this size would NOT fit into our car. Thankful for this find and the kind workers at amazon willing to work with us !
customer_reviews.author: Dereka Lint

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. Dead pixels in first year. Annoying features
customer_reviews.text: Dead pixels in the first year. Small but doesn't make me feel good about the future. Sound problems, there's maybe 10 different sound features and most of them need to be turned off to get rid of audio delay. Random neighbors try to connect to my tv, hard to disable that feature, extremely annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Kewl Dewd

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: I had a Samsung but wanted a bigger screen for my new house. Spent so much money moving from California to Texas and bought a house. This is as good if not better then my Samsung very clear picture sound just from the tv is not bad. Has 4HDMI PORTS WHICH IS GREAT
customer_reviews.author: FLYINGDRAGONRACING52

customer_reviews.title: georgeous
customer_reviews.text: First one was delivered broken, but the delivery guy was the one who insisted on unboxing. No clue where I would be if he had left after I opened the box. Customer svc was already done, I just had to re-order. Painless, minor inconvenience as opposed to renting a vehicle with enough back seat space for this thing. the actual product: Like being in a Drive-in. has all kind of stuff like amazon & netflix right on the remote. Sound is lovely. Toughest thing was mounting it on the entertainment center I got specifically for that :) is a 2 man job
customer_reviews.author: krakr

customer_reviews.title: Sound is not all that greta
customer_reviews.text: Sound is not great. Had good picture and I love all the extra features but have to unplug every once in a while so it updates or else the apps and other features dont work. I knew I would have to do that but we have had it for less than 2 months and have had to do it like 5 times already
customer_reviews.author: Priscyla

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had three 65" TVs so far and this one is by far the best I have ever owned. It has an app store instead of preset apps. The built in wifi receiver is plenty fast and it has a ethernet port for wired internet (very little difference). This TV is less than 50 lbs making it easy to move by yourself. My only complaint is it's small plastic feet that come with the TV seem pretty frail, I really wish LG would have kept the metal ones like on their previous model
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Terrible waste of money sound quality SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: No option to control the volume when commercials come on or noise changes on whatever your watching We are constantly grimacing and grabbing the remote and adjusting the volume through every single show that we watch. I will never buy another LG again and simply stick with Samsung. I took a 12 year old flat screen Samsung off the wall and replace it with this piece of sht Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: worth the money for the picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the picture quality and I have a super uhd tv as well, same brand. I can't tell the difference between them thus far. I the picture quality seems the same to me. I have a LG sound bar so I haven't used the sound for the tv yet it was light and was easy to set up. It makes my living room the center of the attention, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Iminxs

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. Packaged very well. Solid TV for the price. Took a bit to figure out how to get the picture looking right but once I shut of the energy saving feature it was all good. Can’t tell you much about the sound because I always rely on my sound bar. I recommend a sound bar and subwoofer for any entertainment set up as it is always night and day. Gave it 4 stars because that means it’s perfect and nothing is perfect. If your looking for a new TV and want to stay under $1,000 this is it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, Not Great Apps
customer_reviews.text: This TV was an excellent buy for the money. Excellent picture, vivid colors. However, the apps that LG provides are lacking. Especially for an Apple user, I can't sync my iPhone or MacBook to stream content (it does have several android integration apps however).
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Greenlee

customer_reviews.title: Loved this TV but it had some problems
customer_reviews.text: We loved this TV. Great picture quality, easy to set up and use. However there were issues with the picture after a short amount of time. LG has terrible customer service and would not resolve the problem. Amazon has amazing customer service. Amazon helped us get through the problems with the TV they were professional and extremely responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S. Ackor

customer_reviews.title: Panel Needed To Be Replaced After 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: Was working fine until a vertical strip started to appear on the left side of the screen. It was repaired - but still a cause for concern as I have never needed to have a TV repaired before. Luckily was within the one year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: B. Reule

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dark
customer_reviews.text: Have struggling adjusting brightness. The screen is very dark. The brightness is set to 50% by default. Setting to higher values helps for a while, but not sure if it is memorizing the setting.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Kobidze

customer_reviews.title: Great picture decent price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lg 65” tv a few months ago. At first I thought it was great. However recently I have noticed an extremely iratating ringing in my ears. When I don’t watch the lg tv for a day the ringing in my ears goes away. However after not watching the tv for a day and watching it again the ringing in my ears returns. I have tried this several times and the results are always the same. I will be getting rid of this piece of junk and never buy another lg product. It’s really a shame because the picture is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Hoss

customer_reviews.title: Broken within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this tv. After about one month of use, a vertical line appeared in the screen that is now visible all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation & set up
customer_reviews.text: We have had this TV several months ago and really enjoy it. Very good color and resolution. Had to buy a wall mounting kit.
customer_reviews.author: John B Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Good looking Picture!
customer_reviews.text: Good looking picture. The unit came as advertised and looks great. Mounted on a swing out bracket and looks good on the wall. The sound comes out the bottom/back of the TV and while it sounds good behind the TV, it isn't great out in front. It is mounted on a swing out support that doesn't allow the sound to "bounce" against a hard surface perhaps like it normally would, and for what I'm using it for it is fine. If it bothered me I would most likely get a sound bar with this nice a TV anyway. Good TV. Can't speak to durability - I've had it about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture!
customer_reviews.text: We have always owned LG TVs and have always loved them. This one is very very nice. Very bright and clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Wi-Fi keeps dropping
customer_reviews.text: The TV loses its connection to the wi-fi network multiple times a week, so many of its smart features and applications like netflix, amazon prime video, and youtube are not available until I manually tell the tv which wifi network to use and / or enter the wifi password again.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Queern

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The TV came damaged - the company offered to fix it, but it would have taken over a week for the parts and then for them to fix it. Not to mention they first said they could fix it in a couple of days - but then called back to say it would take longer. It's frustrating when you buy a new TV and it already needs fixing - returned item with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect reliably to the 'net.
customer_reviews.text: The device simply cannot maintain a connection with the internet w/AT&T as the ISP because of a LG software problem. LG has provided no patch or assistance with the issue. It is common as can be seen by the various forums. Will not purchase an LG product again.
customer_reviews.author: Paulie

customer_reviews.title: It wont last through shipping
customer_reviews.text: I can not give an adequate review. I ordered this TV twice had to return both times for major damages internally and externally. It seemed nicely built but unless you pick it up shipping it will prove to be futile as it will never arrive without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Capt.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal/Price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect picture and awesome colors. I am very satisfied with my new big screen. Quick delivery, easy setup.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Had 5 months then little black square appeared and keeps popping up and going away.
customer_reviews.author: tait

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV
customer_reviews.text: Waited a long time for a 65 inch TV. Worth the wait. The smart features are awesome, color is great....set up easy. The base stand is pretty wide, so it does need a larger TV stand than one with a shorter span...but other than that, LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Great picture!
customer_reviews.text: Had an older LG 47" flat screen and was for many years happy. Upgraded to this 65". The TV is great for the day I've had it. Amazon dropped the ball with shipping!
customer_reviews.author: AG Wise

customer_reviews.title: The base is 57”, your stand will need to be at least that long
customer_reviews.text: I love the picture on this tv, sound is acceptable for a living room setting. Follow the instructions to install the stand, it’s a two person job but makes sure you never put pressure on the screen. The stand is somewhat sturdy, a drawback being they are on the edges of the unit. Finding a piece of furniture long enough to put it on is a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: SK0812

customer_reviews.title: Truly Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tv in August and am still blown away with the picture! It just jumps off the screen .Everyone who comes by says they feel like the picture is ‘right there ‘and so clear I definitely recommend this tv!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Happy tv
customer_reviews.text: Decent tv and a very decent quality picture. My husband and I enjoy watching movies on this and playing our video games. Nothing came broken so I was very happy and pleased with that. I would recommend this television as it also is very affordable
customer_reviews.author: Candy Rayne

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice LG TV!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV mainly because of price and availability... but wow, what a great picture and refresh rate! The sound lacks bass a little but nothing a soundbar couldn't fix. Totally satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Im so glad we bought this. We haven't had any problems but even if we did Amazon returns are easy and painless.
customer_reviews.author: David Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time, the setup was easy. Great picture quality and sound. Lot of different options for picture quality and sound. Only drawback is with the TV remote, have a Hisense tv nearby and the remote controls both tv's the same with the Hisense remote. Other than that love the tv and picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HDMI ports are trash.
customer_reviews.text: The HDMI ports burned out except for one. This TV was too expensive for a stupid malfunction like this.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Stager

customer_reviews.title: “No Signal” message RUINS it. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: The “No Signal” message on the home screen has ruined this TV for me and I will be returning it immediately for a full refund. The LG forum is FULL of users like me asking for a simple fix to this problem. NO RESPONSE WHATSOEVER. Embarrassing for LG and Amazon to be selling such a poorly supported product.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Porter

customer_reviews.title: Second unit is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: First one showed up with a broken screen. was replaced in a week. Second unit is AWESOME!!! Should have gotten the 72" but love this 65" . Tons of apps, great color. Very nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Paynter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: 65” is pretty damn big for a TV so just make sure you’re measurements are correct for where it’s going. Overall I have no complaints. The set up was fast and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV! The delivery and set up team were both quick and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive TV
customer_reviews.text: Picture on this TV is great. I took a star off because of the awkward placement of the feet and the sound quality of the built in speakers is not great. All in all though this TV is an excellent deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Condon

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: This tv has a great picture! Bright, crisp an clear picture! Just turn the energy saver off an its brighter
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: Good  value!
customer_reviews.text: Good size, good design, good loaded content, ease to set up. Image could be crispier. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Arsenio Pagliarini Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new tv
customer_reviews.text: Volume is at 12 and can hear the tv clear as day. Picture quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Disappointment Here
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Smart television as an up grade from my last LG smart television. I wanted a larger screen and I was not disappointed. No damages and was assembled by the folks who delivered the product.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Am loving it!!
customer_reviews.text: Am now rocking my 4k hd mounted on my wall,remove the 55" Samsung I had there for a bigger screen am so happy thanks amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Moqueen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the quality of the picture when watching nature shows. Embedded Netflix and Amazon app are very convenient. Granted my previous TV was 720p 37” LED, so I’m not the best judge. But it feels like a good deal for the price..
customer_reviews.author: Serge

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv. It is perfect size for the space. Everything LG makes is solid
customer_reviews.author: LISA THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: LG it’s the King of Tv’s
customer_reviews.text: I bought this LG brand because I still have the older one gave it to my brother still works I bought it went Call if duty 2 came out.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Tv didn’t work correctly
customer_reviews.text: Tv was not working correctly. Had to call a repair shop to fix the screen. Won’t be repaired for another week. Second tv delivered and neither one worked correctly. Do you have a problem delivering tv’s. I would say you do.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: loosing Internet connection
customer_reviews.text: this tv is constantly loosing network connection. You have to re-insert your WiFi configuration over and over and over.... It is a waste of time. I wish I can change this tv.
customer_reviews.author: Recio Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: HDMI ports keep going offline
customer_reviews.text: The hdmi ports go offline and I have to perform a hard reset. It already happened like five times in one month.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great TV with built in roku and internet and blue tooth. That’s cool.
customer_reviews.author: Arno Basson

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WITH ALEXA
customer_reviews.text: How can Amazon say this is Alexa certified? The TV as purchased DOES NOT WORK WITH ALEXA. You will have to buy a $60 additional magic remote that is not in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Excel

customer_reviews.title: Avoid Electronic Express
customer_reviews.text: This is a 65" TV I purchased in October and then decided it was a Christmas gift. So, it was not opened until the Saurday after Christmas when I had helpers..that's when it was determined the screen was broken. Now Electronic Express is saying there's nothing that can be done ?!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Larson

customer_reviews.title: It is broken when arrived
customer_reviews.text: I received it broken and need to return it so never turn on the tv to look at the quality
customer_reviews.author: Hoiyin K

customer_reviews.title: Light at top of screen.
customer_reviews.text: TV would be OK if it wasn't for the white light that appears at the top of the screen just below the frame. Extremely irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Jimeny Jack

customer_reviews.title: It's got everything! Suitable for everyone and should accommodate most needs
customer_reviews.text: Love the smart feature; Netflix, hulu, Amazon video, etc. Favorite part is google assistant, makes finding everything a lot easier and quicker - very intelligent processor inside. Great for gaming and picture quality is unmatched. Only dislike would be some apps don't work but I may just have to update.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Wrongs screws for legs!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed to get home just to realize I can put my TV up because it had the wrong screws In the box so now I have to go find and buy the correct screws for the legs
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Very well packaged and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a handicapped friend that lives for tv. His previous VISIO crashed an I hope this lasts for him.
customer_reviews.author: David Piersall

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can’t beat it. Have to figure the picture in order to set it up the way you want it and that can be confusing
customer_reviews.author: Missy Bauder

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv. The picture is great. I use it with Apple TV to get the full 4K
customer_reviews.author: Banky

customer_reviews.title: Great picture!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great picture at an unbelievable price. Lots of options. Everybody comments on the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Carlson

customer_reviews.title: large enough to fit a 65 inch tv on
customer_reviews.text: The design is beautiful! And will fit a 65 inch tv on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From my projection screen to a 65 inch flatscreen perfect
customer_reviews.text: From my projection screen to a 65 inch flatscreen perfect
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto M.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked screen
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get the the TV 1/2 way out of box and discovered the screen broken. Not sure if this is a shipping issue or manufacturer defect but my first and last time ordering a TV online
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. Everything on it is great and it has lots of viewing options
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture. Delivery was amazing also, they came and set it up and took all the trash with them. This is the only way to buy a TV!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Hathorn

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This Tv is not even 6months from purchase date and its already giving problems. It goes ON and OFF. It keeps blinking when in use.
customer_reviews.author: PuffyErnest

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little extra for a nicer model
customer_reviews.text: The screen is very glossy, so the glare during the day is almost intolerable. I have two medium sized windows in my living room and the screen looks like a mirror even with the shades fully drawn. The picture quality is only moderately better than my previous 2012 Sony 60”.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Andresen

customer_reviews.title: hdmi 1 has stopped working
customer_reviews.text: hdmi 1 has stopped working sad you make such shit
customer_reviews.author: me2

customer_reviews.title: LG is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: LG makes awesome products....this is just another in the list. Wow! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joel D. Michna

customer_reviews.title: It matches my pocket
customer_reviews.text: I do like it and i use it for home. Regarding its durability, it is to early to say.
customer_reviews.author: Kidist

customer_reviews.title: Not a big LG fan, but was well impressed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good picture quality, easy to operate, looks good. Hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Roge R.

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good TV set! Very satisfied customer! And the delivery guys were of great assistance getting it up the stairs with me!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Pickett

customer_reviews.title: It's big
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and sound I got a manly so to hook up my soundbar and the price was very good
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bruso

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: I like it’s ease of use and the picture/sound quality is awesome
customer_reviews.author: richard c.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT picture
customer_reviews.text: The speakers on this tv were a nice surprise, with my last few TVs I HAD to have a soundbar to hear it decently.
customer_reviews.author: DrkRdr

customer_reviews.title: Quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: 65” LG quality TV, 1st unit was damaged but replaced within a couple days with no issues
customer_reviews.author: WILDGAME COOKBOOK

customer_reviews.title: Great 65" TV
customer_reviews.text: Very nice big TV for the price! Easy set up!
customer_reviews.author: anblank711

customer_reviews.title: Great TV great service from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Well the first tv came broke, but the replacement is what I was expecting, Thank Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rivero

customer_reviews.title: Alexa features still in beta.
customer_reviews.text: A good TV, fairly simple to set up. However I bought this for the Alexa connectivity and it seems to still be almost in beta. Half of the commands do not work. And was a huge pain to try to juggle all the apps to get it to work in the first place. Still considering if I should return it. After a while I have learned how to use it better. However this sentence pretty much sums the whole experience up. You can turn the TV off with Alexa but you cannot turn it on with it.
customer_reviews.author: landy K hayes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Large Screen TV But disappointed with manual
customer_reviews.text: This is used in our basement for family entertainment. Don’t like tat there is no owners manual that illustrates setup. Every thing is done on the tv without written instructions. Not being tech savvy, I don’t know what all the initials stand for and what will happen with different options activated.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Wiederspan

customer_reviews.title: Repacking 65" tv isn't fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved tv, put on wall turned on and two round white circles top center of tv, do discussed. Not ordering another .Shopping at local store instead.
customer_reviews.author: gil

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Like
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how all of the movies look like soap operas. Poor picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inferior picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the picture quality and clarity. I spent hours using most of the included adjustments trying to achieve a crisp and sharp picture, without any luck. We replaced our 60 inch Samsung with the LG UHD 65 inch, and unfortunately this 2018 TV is sub par at best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very dim display
customer_reviews.text: First one showed up with a broken screen, return process was easy and they quickly replaced it. Tv arrived and I was really excited to watch a UHD movie on it, everything was just very dark. Contrast is terrible. I've gone through the video settings and everything is almost too dark to watch. The display is super dim so it's almost like you're not even getting any of the 4K details. I'll probably be putting my 5 year old 55" Samsung back out in the living room. Positives: Lightweight Cheap Thin perimeter Easy to connect my surround sound Smart functions work well Negatives: Not bright enough to see First came with a broken screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LG Electronics 65UK6300PUE 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart TV (2018 Model)
product_meta.description:
The UK6300 is crafted with a slim, seamless body that’s ideal for any room aesthetic. This new LG UHD TV with AI (Artificial Intelligence) ThinQ becomes the hub for the smart home: Using Intelligent Voice control, speak into the LG Magic Remote* to pull up family photos, control light settings, check the weather and more. The UK6300 uses a powerful quad core processor that minimizes video noise, enhances sharpness and assures accurate colors for a remarkably lifelike 4K picture. This LG 4K TV supports multiple formats of HDR content, including HDR10 and HLG, both optimized with scene by scene picture adjustment.

*Service limited to certain languages. Some features require 3rd party service subscription. Requires LG Magic Remote, sold separately.
feature_bullets: Dimensions (Wx H x D): TV without stand 57.8" x 33.6" x 3.5", TV with stand: 57.8" x 36.1" x 10.6"
Smart functionality gives you access to your favorite apps and content using LG ThinQ AI which is compatible with Amazon Alexa (sold separately) Connectivity Wi-Fi Built In 802.11ac
The multi-format 4K high dynamic range (HDR) support includes HDR10, both with lg’s advanced tone Mapping technology that provides scene-by-scene optimization
The IPS technology in LG TV uses in-plane switching to deliver rich colors and a strong contrast Ratio that remain Consistent at wide viewing angles
Inputs: 3 HDMI, 2 USB, 1 RF, 1 Composite in shared with component, 1 Ethernet, 1 Optical and Audio Return Channel Support via HDMI. Smart TV Operating System: LG ThinQ AI
Refresh Rate - TruMotion 120 (Native 60Hz); Wi-Fi Built In: Yes (802.11ac)
